operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT IGNORE INTO message_boxes (user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2) VALUES (:user_id, :user_message_box_id, :dialog_id, :dialog_message_id, :message_data_id, :message_box_type, :reply_to_msg_id, :mentioned, :media_unread, :date2)

operation.name: SelectByMessageIdList
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id AND deleted = 0 AND user_message_box_id IN (:idList) ORDER BY user_message_box_id DESC

operation.name: SelectByMessageId
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id AND user_message_box_id = :user_message_box_id AND deleted = 0 LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectByMessageDataIdList
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE deleted = 0 AND message_data_id IN (:idList) ORDER BY user_message_box_id DESC

operation.name: SelectByMessageDataId
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE message_data_id = :message_data_id AND deleted = 0 LIMIT 1

operation.name: SelectBackwardByOffsetLimit
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id AND dialog_id = :dialog_id AND user_message_box_id < :user_message_box_id AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY user_message_box_id DESC LIMIT :limit

operation.name: SelectForwardByPeerOffsetLimit
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id AND dialog_id = :dialog_id AND user_message_box_id >= :user_message_box_id AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY user_message_box_id LIMIT :limit

operation.name: SelectPeerMessageId
operation.sql: SELECT user_message_box_id, message_box_type FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :peerId AND deleted = 0 AND message_data_id = (SELECT message_data_id FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id AND user_message_box_id = :user_message_box_id AND deleted = 0 LIMIT 1)

operation.name: SelectPeerDialogMessageIdList
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id <> :user_id AND dialog_message_id in (SELECT dialog_message_id FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id AND user_message_box_id in (:idList)) AND deleted = 0

operation.name: SelectDialogMessageListByMessageId
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE dialog_message_id = (SELECT dialog_message_id FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id AND user_message_box_id = :user_message_box_id) AND deleted = 0

operation.name: SelectPeerDialogMessageListByMessageId
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id <> :user_id AND dialog_message_id = (SELECT dialog_message_id FROM messages WHERE user_id = :user_id AND user_message_box_id = :user_message_box_id) AND deleted = 0

operation.name: SelectLastTwoMessageId
operation.sql: SELECT user_message_box_id FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY user_message_box_id DESC LIMIT 2

operation.name: SelectDialogsByMessageIdList
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id AND user_message_box_id IN (:idList) AND deleted = 0

operation.name: DeleteMessagesByMessageIdList
operation.sql: UPDATE message_boxes SET deleted=1 WHERE user_id = :user_id AND user_message_box_id IN (:idList) AND deleted = 0

operation.name: SelectDialogMessageIdList
operation.sql: SELECT user_message_box_id, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id = :user_id AND dialog_id = :dialog_id AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY user_message_box_id DESC

operation.name: SelectPeerMessageList
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, user_message_box_id, dialog_id, dialog_message_id, message_data_id, message_box_type, reply_to_msg_id, mentioned, media_unread, date2 FROM message_boxes WHERE user_id != :user_id AND message_data_id = :message_data_id AND deleted = 0

operation.name: UpdateMediaUnread
operation.sql: UPDATE message_boxes SET media_unread = 0 WHERE user_id = :user_id AND user_message_box_id = :user_message_box_id
